fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Name 
: TRA MINH HOANG (Leo Tech)  
Date of Birth 
: 27 - 11 - 1986 
Gender 
: Male 
Marital Status 
: Single 
Address 
: 12/8/5 Street 8, Hiep Sinh Phuoc Ward, Thu Duc District, Ho Chi Minh 
City, Vietnam 
Email 
: helloleotech@gmail.com 
Phone number 
: (+84) 94 494 7786 
PERSONAL DETAILS
I am a Software Engineer. I have experience in PHP and my strongest PHP framework is Laravel, 
WordPress and I am able to handle Zend, Magento. 
Good knowledge language Backend NodeJS and frameworks ExpressJS and view engine jade, 
ejs. 
Good knowledge language Frontend: ReactJS, Redux, AngularJS, VueJS. 
Good knowledge MEAN/MERN Stack and LEMP/LAMP. 
Good knowledge in Python programming language use Big Data, Machine Learning. 
In addition, I participate in analyzing, designing, developing, implementing and testing ... 
following the requirements from project manager. I participate in design/code review and 
reporting to PM at the end of the day. 
Experience working with REST-full API. 
Has worked with Databases like MySQL, MongoDB and PostgreSQL. 
Knowledge in Linux/Apache/Nginx. 
I am using GIT and experienced with SVN in bugs tracking, using GitHub, Trello and BITBUCKET 
and Jira in source code control.   
Finally, I am a responsible, honest, open-minded and confident person. 
OBJECTIVE (or SUMMARY)
